verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:27
verses.text: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:28
verses.text: And over the olive trees and the sycomore trees that were in the low plains was Baal–hanan the Gederite: and over the cellars of oil was Joash:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:29
verses.text: And over the herds that fed in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds that were in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:30
verses.text: Over the camels also was Obil the Ishmaelite: and over the asses was Jehdeiah the Meronothite:
